static member AssertStatic : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment * Func<Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Runtime.SchemaAssertionContext, 'T> -> Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.DataView<'T>

Docs.typeparam: The type representing the view's schema shape
Docs.param: The view to assert the static schema on
The host environment to keep in the statically typed variant
The delegate through which we declare the schema, which ought to use the input to declare a of the indices, properly named
Docs.summary: Asserts that a given data view has the indicated schema. If this method returns without throwing then the view has been validated to have columns with the indicated names and types.
Docs.returns: A statically typed wrapping of the input view
